author: Good Enough
description: ADX Florence is America’s only federal supermax prison, often called the “Alcatraz of the Rockies.” Hidden in the Colorado desert, this fortress was built to hold the nation’s most dangerous inmates under conditions designed to make escape impossible. ADX Florence is considered the most secure prison in the United States, from 23 hour solitary confinement in concrete cells to razor wire fences, motion sensors, and guard towers that keep constant watch.
title: The U.S.'s Scariest Prison 😰💀 #didyouknow #prison #unbelievable #animation
